sen.j: 高坂王（たかさかのおおきみ、たかさかおう、生年不詳 - 天武天皇12年 (683年) 6月6日）は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: Takasaka no Okimi (year of birth unknown - June 6, 683) lived in the Asuka period in Japan.

sen.e: Although he supported Emperor Kobun during the Jinshin War in 672, they lost and he was obedient to Prince Oama (Emperor Tenmu).

sen.e: The city in Yamato was an ancient capital in Asuka as against Omi no miya, the capital at that time, and the guard of the city was a officer to protect the City in Yamato.
